nodes.text: The Tularan Marsh was a swamp on Taris that formed at the site of several abandoned swoop tracks. By 3643 BBY, the region had become a swamp, and the area was home to k'lor'slugs, nexu, ferrazid hounds, and bogwings. The Republic restoration effort set up two research stations near the marsh, and pirates had a camp to the south of it.
During the Cold War, a traveling hero ventured into the eastern end of the marsh to help Tarkos Sund recover the prototype accelerator used by Revan to beat Brejik in a swoop race.
